contentList.content: Steel your soul and venture into its depths.

Your brain has grown ears, or at least that's what it feels like. You may wiggle them with a Ki Point, casting Detect Thoughts and granting yourself Advantage on Insight Checks against creatures with lower Intelligence than you.
You have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Insight <LSTag Tooltip="SkillCheck">Checks</LSTag> against creatures with lower <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag> than you.
Your strikes instill the chill and pressure of the deep. Your unarmed attacks deal an additional [1].
Your unarmed attacks deal an additional [1].

"The mind has to wrap around the neck."

-Michael "Scranton Strangler" Scott

You are forever touched by the inscrutable depths, making it hard for normies to comprehend your movements and physical form. Your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> becomes 10 plus your Intelligence and Wisdom <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifiers</LSTag>, and you gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Psychic and Cold Damage.

You are forever touched by the inscrutable depths, making it hard for normies to comprehend your movements and physical form. Your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> becomes 12 plus your Intelligence and Wisdom <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifiers</LSTag>, and you gain <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> to Psychic and Cold Damage.
Punch twice in quick succession, and let your unsettling aura possibly inflict <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MADNESS">Madness</LSTag> in your target.
